svg.text: InnoDB Buffer Pool Size: 128MB vs 6GB Performance Analysis

g.text: ‚Ä¢ Frequent disk I/O for data pages
‚Ä¢ Minimal disk I/O for cached data
üöÄ Why Larger Buffer Pool Improves Concurrent Inserts
Frequent page evictions ‚Ä¢ Cache misses ‚Ä¢ Disk I/O bottlenecks
‚Ä¢ Lock contention on buffer pool mutex
Stable cache ‚Ä¢ Minimal evictions ‚Ä¢ Parallel processing
‚Ä¢ More dirty pages can be buffered
üìâ Why Larger Buffer Pool Can Slow Down Reads

Fast Medium Slow
